hero.heading:
TRAVEL
AROUND

services.heading: Our Services
services.service1_description: Book domestic and international flight tickets at the best prices with expert travel support.
services.service2_description: Receive personalized guidance and expert support for all types of visa applications.
services.service3_description: Apply for your visa online with complete documentation assistance and real-time updates.
services.service4_description: Book appointments for embassies, passports, medicals, and other travel needs easily online.
services.service5_description: Get reliable travel insurance and custom itinerary planning for a safe and organized trip.
services.service6_description: Find and reserve the best hotels worldwide with flexible options and great deals.
services.service7_description: Enjoy safe, on-time airport pickups and drop-offs with professional drivers.
services.service8_description: Accurate and professional translation of travel and visa documents in Tamil, English, and Dutch.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Sample text. Click to select the text box. Click again or double click to start editing the text.

newsletter.heading: Join Our Travel World
newsletter.description: Subscribe to our newsletter for exclusive travel deals, visa updates, expert travel tips, and early access to special offers. Start your journey with us!

footer.footer_description: We provide reliable travel services including flights, visas, hotels, and more to make your journey safe, smooth, and memorable.
